alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 8:14AM MDT until June 27 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... South Platte River near Weldona affecting Weld and Morgan Counties. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Platte River near Weldona. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, The river is out of its banks and into fields and meadows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.7 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
